Body:
"""
    Test of utils.get_inital_path function
    """
test_path = utils.get_initial_path(x1, xT, p, shape)
assert np.allclose(test_path, expected)
pytest.mark.parametrize('x1,xT,p,shape,expected', [(x1, xT, p, 'linear',
    expected1), (x1, xT, p, 'quadratic', expected2), (x1, xT, p, 'ratio',
    expected3), (xT, xT, p, 'linear', expected4), (xT, xT, p, 'quadratic',
    expected4), (xT, xT, p, 'ratio', expected4)], ids=['linear',
    'quadratic', 'ratio', 'linear - trivial', 'quadratic - trivial',
    'ratio- trivial'])
